advancement.os_advancements.gourmet_dora: Eat every golden food in the game.

advancement.os_advancements.apropiacion_: Kill a zombie with rotten flesh, a skeleton with a bone, or a Blaze with a Blaze rod.

Use a totem of undying 100 times.

advancement.os_advancements.over_the_gar:
Plant every flower in the game.
